PICOs.Population: Adult patients with non-small cell bronchial cancer (NCBC) KRAS p.G12C metastatic mutated, pre-treated
PICOs.Outcomes: Objective response rate, adverse events, tolerability

PICOs.Population: Patients who received at least one dose of sotorasib
PICOs.Outcomes: Adverse events, serious adverse events, treatment discontinuation due to adverse events
